results.title: Choice of antihypertensive agent in isolated systolic hypertension and isolated diastolic hypertension: A secondary analysis of the ALLHAT trial.
results.text_hl: We compared the use of @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on the primary outcome of combined @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@, @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, or all-cause mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with isolated @<m>DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@systolic hypertension@@@ or isolated @DISEASE_Hypertension_Diastolic_Resistance_to @DISEASE_MESH:C563897 @@@diastolic hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang SY, Hanna JM, Gongal P, Onuma OK, Nanna MG. Choice of antihypertensive agent in isolated systolic hypertension and isolated diastolic hypertension: A secondary analysis of the ALLHAT trial. Am Heart J. 2022 Dec;254():30-34. PMID: 35932912

results.title: Effect of candesartan and lisinopril alone and in combination on blood pressure and microalbuminuria.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Twenty-three elderly @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@systolic hypertension@@@ completed a double-blind crossover study comparing placebo, @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Carbon @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002244 @@@C@@@) 16 mg, C32 mg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@L@@@) 20 mg, L40 mg and C16 mg + L20 mg.

citations.NLM: Morgan T, Anderson A, Bertram D, MacInnis RJ. Effect of candesartan and lisinopril alone and in combination on blood pressure and microalbuminuria. J Renin Angiotensin Aldosterone Syst. 2004 Jun;5(2):64-71. PMID: 15295717

results.title: Lisinopril therapy for hemodialysis hypertension: hemodynamic and endocrine responses.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ therapy for hemodialysis @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@: hemodynamic and endocrine responses.

results.title: Additive effects of diltiazem and lisinopril in the treatment of elderly patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension.
results.text_hl: The combinations of @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@ 240 mg + @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 10 mg and @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@ 120 mg + @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 10 mg showed increased efficacy in reducing @<m>DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@systolic@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Murmurs @DISEASE_MESH:D006337 @@@diastolic@@@ blood pressure compared to these drug doses used in monotherapy, but the effect of the combinations was less than predicted by an additive model.

citations.NLM: Chan P, Lin CN, Tomlinson B, Lin TH, Lee YS. Additive effects of diltiazem and lisinopril in the treatment of elderly patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension. Am J Hypertens. 1997 Jul;10(7 Pt 1):743-9. PMID: 9234828
citations.BibTeX: @article{9234828, title={Additive effects of diltiazem and lisinopril in the treatment of elderly patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension.}, author={Chan P and Lin CN and Tomlinson B and Lin TH and Lee YS}, journal={Am J Hypertens}, volume={10}, number={7 Pt 1}, pages={743-9}}
